results.title: Metformin and proliferation of cancer cell lines.
results.text_hl: ...INTRODUCTION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is a widely used drug in treating @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes@@@ and @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@insulin resistance@@@ and nowadays scientists are searching for new poten-tial and multiple roles in prevention and treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Auditory_Perceptual_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001308 @@@carcinogenic processes@@@.
